title: Discontinuation of benralizumab in Canadian patients with severe eosinophilic asthma.
abstract: Within 1 year, 15% of Canadian patients with severe asthma discontinue benralizumab. The reasons for discontinuation are not yet characterised. https://bit.ly/3kaRDlp.
